articleList.title: ant design part
articleList.description: Ant Design, a design language for background applications, is refined by Ant UED Team.
articleList.content: We supply a series of design principles, practical patterns and high quality design resources (Sketch and Axure), to help people create their product prototypes beautifully and efficiently.
